name: Tokyo Wars
overview:
Tokyo Wars is an arcade tank action game for up to 8 players

Players drive their tanks around a 3D environment trying to find and blow up tanks of the enemy force. It is possible to crush oil drums, traffic signs, parked cars and certain walls of buildings. Damage to your vehicle is shown as cracks in the glass of your screen. Blowing up an enemy tanks leaves either a health power up or a shield power up. Both the player and enemy tanks are re-spawned after they've been destroyed.

At the start of the game, players select to join either the green force or the white force. After that the player selects one of two battlefields, bay area or downtown Tokyo. The game supports a maximum of 8 players, although in the arcades a cabinet setup for 2 or 4 player is more common. Players can switch between first person or third person view during play.
